players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie's death is tragic. We need to share observations carefully. Who seems most suspicious so far?"
Bob: "I am the detective and found Alice to be the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
You: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and investigated Diana last night - she is the mafioso. We must vote Diana out."
You: "Bob is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me. I'm the real detective and confirmed Diana is innocent. We must vote Bob out to save the town."

Diana: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you claim to investigate Diana last night? Charlie died, so you couldn't have investigated anyone. Bob is telling the truth - we should vote Alice out."
Bob: "I am the detective and have evidence that Alice is the mafioso. I suggest we vote her out immediately to prevent any further harm to the town."
